# cmccloudv2_keymanagement_secret (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_keymanagement_secret" "passphrase_1" {
    container_id = "900a7d29-9f06-4eed-ac8f-9bb020ff9ad1"
    name         = "passphrase"
    type         = "passphrase"
    content      = "0123456789aA"
    expiration   = "2026-06-11T16:05:06.277Z"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `container_id` (String) The ID of the key management container
- `content` (String, Sensitive) The content of the key management secret
- `name` (String) The name of the key management secret
- `type` (String) The type of the key management secret

### Optional

- `expiration` (String) The expiration time of the key management secret
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The created time of the key management secret
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `secret_ref` (String) The reference of the key management secret

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `update` (String)
